short.ja: Ethereumのブラウザ・エクステンション
short.th: ส่วนขยายเบราว์เซอร์สำหรับอีเธอเรียม
short.vi: Tính năng Ethereum cho trình duyệt
short.zh_TW: 乙太坊瀏覽器擴充插件

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KardiaChain Wallet is an extension for accessing KardiaChain Network.

It lets the user create and manage their own Wallet Address on KardiaChain Network (via private keys, local client wallet and support hardware wallets like Trezor, Ledger Nano...), so when a Dapp wants to perform a transaction and write to the blockchain, the user gets a secure interface to review the transaction, before approving or rejecting it.

The extension injects the web3 API into website's javascript context, so that Dapps can interact with KardiaChain Network.

The source code of this extension is publication on Github:
https://github.com/kardiachain/kardia-wallet-extension
